channel.title: Slower training please
channel.description: hi, i've recently made my first server, but people are maxing within the hour! how do i change the exp from dummies, hay bales and doors? thanks!

item.title: Slower training please
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Search for these cases:
case 823:

case 1531:

case 299:

Now, you should see SOMETHING SIMILAR! (depends on your source).
Your dummy case should be like this:

case 823: actionAmount++; if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy like a pussy..."); setAnimation(1746); addSkillXP((5500*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((9000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((6000*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;
the sendMessage is different in all sources (most of the time).
Now, to edit the exp, do you see the addSkillXP? Change the numbers to the amount of experience you want it to give to your players.

Read full topic

item.title: Slower training please
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

you just search the id code in client.java, and change how much exp is given per hit.
